name: Trash Shooters
description: You are a pirate in a lake and you find alive trash in the waters. Shoot them down in 1 minute. This is my first game, and im planning on adding other things (e.g: shop, levels, different costumes, etc), so it wont be that good to the games you are used to play. Also, if there is any bugs or things you want added please say it in the comments. Im only enabling it for that porpose.
